KMB: Stop 1's stop ID retrieved from the KMB API, e.g. 1234567890ABCDEF
Stop 2's stop ID retrieved from the KMB API, e.g. 234567890ABCDEF1
Stop 3's stop ID retrieved from the KMB API, e.g. 34567890ABCDEF12
Stop 4's stop ID retrieved from the KMB API, e.g. 4567890ABCDEF123
CTB: Stop 1's stop ID retrieved from the CTB API, e.g. 012345
Stop 2's stop ID retrieved from the CTB API, e.g. 123456
